CustomField.formula: SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( Upper( right( Email , Len( Email ) - FIND( "@" , Email , 1 ) ) ) , "EMSAVAITION.COM" , "HONEYWELL.COM" ) , "HONEYWELL-TSI.COM" , "HONEYWELL.COM" ) , "KCP.COM" , "HONEYWELL.COM" ) , "BENDIXKING.COM" , "HONEYWELL.COM" )
CustomField.label: Email Domain
